text: Christina Aguilera Goes Back To Basics On Soul - Baring ‘ Liberation ’ Ballad, ‘ Twice ’! Fresh off announcing her upcoming The Liberation Tour and duet performance for “ Fall In Line ” with Demi Lovato at the 2018 Billboard Music Awards later this month, Christina Aguilera has released another new song from her upcoming album Liberation : “ Twice “! Here ’ s the thing : Xtina ‘ s grand return to the music scene, “ Accelerate, ” is fine, but it ’ s not the most comeback - ready or awe - inspiring track of 2018, real talk.
